Author: cryptossi
Title: ❤️[PreSale][ANN]Aimedis - HEALTHCARE CHANGED FOREVER❗️10k PATIENTS IN HOSPITALS❗
Body: Okay I got a really good answer in the end on telegram from Roxana, the important thing is to bear in mind there are 3 main types of data, medical, sensitive and synced.  AIMchain is the blockchain solution that Aimedis has developed and on this chain it will store medical data such as discharge letters, medical documents, dr signatures, rights management, etc.  This is the kind of data users will be able to share with their doctors on the platform. Sensitive data such as diagnosis, operation records and text copies of psychiatrist conversations will be held privately by the hospital or medical practice.  The sensitive data is sent between user and hospital through HL7 protocol, Aimedis does not hold this data and this is how they will be able to transfer clinical and administrative data. There is also synced data which is the data that is collected from smart devices and medical trackers but this will also not be stored on the blockchain.  Hope this makes sense look at the Aimedis telegram if you want to see the convo I had with Roxana.

Author: cryptossi
Title: ❤️[PreSale][ANN]Aimedis - HEALTHCARE CHANGED FOREVER❗️10k PATIENTS IN HOSPITALS❗
Body: I asked the team on Telegram and Roxana, the CCO, replied to me. I asked her your question and she said:  "You will still have to do medical checkups with your doctor and upload your results to your Aimedis profile. You also need to grant your Aimedis doctor permission to view your medical data and based on the outcome of your appointment, the doctor will send you a prescription for your medicine online. You will then be able to order your medicine online.  Aimedis will also store doctors signatures on the blockchain and this means you will not have any issues with going to a local drug store or ordering online using your e-prescription".  I think is the answer we were looking for, but it does also depend on your case. If it's a serious condition, you will have to go for a checkup and get your prescription there.  In my opinion, this actually relieves the burden on the public health service because if you think it's something minor you can talk to a doctor online in minutes and they will basically confirm if you need to go see a specialist. So it's almost like a screening process to reduce the number of people going to see a doctor over small, insignificant conditions and wasting valuable time and resources.

Author: xtraelv
Title: ❤️[PreSale][ANN]Aimedis - HEALTHCARE CHANGED FOREVER❗️10k PATIENTS IN HOSPITALS❗
Body: I know the shills are busy having a conversation with "each other". But it is really distracting when you are asking a genuine question here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=3885454.msg43241225#msg43241225  It also makes it super easy to identify the bountyhive shills and which other projects they are pretending to be customers of:       The questions I asked should be really easy to answer and a clear concise answer would make this project stand out from the dodgy ICO's - it would be annoying to start using red bold lettering just to get attention.  Can we please have a real conversation ?  What are the certification numbers for the ISO-9001 and ISO-27001 ? Perhaps you could post an image of the certificates. Are Dr Michael Kaldasch and Dr Ben El Idrissi working on this project full time or are they working at the same time as doctors elsewhere ? Are you able to provide some more details about their previous work as doctors in hospitals ? Which hospitals did they work at ?In which countries are they registered to practice medicine ? I noticed that some of the companies they were previously involved in are now run by others. How does that work with the Intellectual Property rights ? With offices located in a monastery that has been turned into a fitness center.  www.Villa-Vitalis.nl  Is that business related or are they just renting office space there? Which companies are involved ? How is it structured ? Cyomed Deutchland GMBH Rhein Medical Solutions UG IhrArzt24 GMBH  With between $9.000.000 and $36.000.000 being raised from the public - these are questions that are important.

Author: Zombie259
Title: ❤️[PreSale][ANN]Aimedis - HEALTHCARE CHANGED FOREVER❗️10k PATIENTS IN HOSPITALS❗
Body: I try to answer. but unfortunately I don't know most of the answers. I'm only a interested user and follow this project like most others.  - ISO 9001 and ISO27001, I can't find any information about the certification numbers, only the blog entry from december. - According to their linkedin profile Dr Michael Kaldasch and Dr Ben El Idrissi are not working only for AImedis. - Until 2017 Dr. Kaldasch worked in a hospital of the Heinrich Heine Univerity in Düsseldorf  The best way to get answers is the Telegram channel. https://t.me/aimedistoken

Author: xtraelv
Title: ❤️[PreSale][ANN]Aimedis - HEALTHCARE CHANGED FOREVER❗️10k PATIENTS IN HOSPITALS❗
Body: https://blog.aimedis.com/aimedis-now-iso-9001-and-iso-27001-certified/  https://aimedis.com/en_impressum.php  ISO certification according to the website is audited & monitored by bensom GmbH Kleine Spitzengasse 2-4 50676 Köln Germany  The whole idea of ISO is that is it verifiable. For this reason companies usually display the certificates on their website and office wall.   - According to their linkedin profile Dr Michael Kaldasch and Dr Ben El Idrissi are not working only for AImedis.  It would be good to know their other business interests / employment. Various hospitals is vague - even though it is probably very accurate since medical professionals often move around early in their career.  This is a rental car company that they ran while in Düsseldorf   While their extensive business registrations (several medical related) over a number of years is a good sign. Both that they have been working together for such a long time and that they have been in verifiable places - it is hard to gauge the success of those businesses. (Set up on relatively low capital and no verifiable footprint) So it is hard so see if it is a 19.99 euro business registration or a fully operational company.  I did find this: https://healthcare-in-europe.com/de/news/vom-mrt-fuer-die-hosentasche-bis-zum-diabetikerwarnhund.html Where they are in the top 12 for a business plan competition and their names are mentioned. https://propertibazar.com/article/sicherheit-in-deutschland-securitas_5a7bbe27d64ab20a4506ead3.html For the Cyomed platform.  But also this: https://nami.today/icos/be-careful-chances-are-that-hihealth-ico-is-a-scam-206.html Where the other medical ICO they are involved with is warned about and a scam accusation against one of the people involved with that platform. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=3238979.new   - Until 2017 Dr. Kaldasch worked in a hospital of the Heinrich Heine Univerity in Düsseldorf  Heinrich Heine Univerity in Düsseldorf works with the Universitätsklinikum Düsseldorf. I don't think there is a hospital there that shares its name. Company records certainly have him living in Düsseldorf. But with so many tricky ICOs out there and Aimedis raising $36 million - I try to check out the claims.   The best way to get answers is the Telegram channel. https://t.me/aimedistoken  Perhaps you could bring it to their attention.

Title: ❤️[PreSale][ANN]Aimedis - HEALTHCARE CHANGED FOREVER❗️10k PATIENTS IN HOSPITALS❗
Body: Hi everyone.  Sorry to keep you waiting. Updates from Aimedis:  - 23% bonus for pre-sale is about to end. We'll notify everyone via email and Telegram group @aimedistoken about upcoming bonuses.  - last week Michael & Ben, the co-founders, were invited at a private event in China. We are in discussions with two partners to help us enter the Chinese healthcare market.  - 28 July - August 2nd, the co-founders will be attending a series of meetings and events in Dubai, alongside our advisors and crypto investors. - 28 July - August 5th, Aimedis is doing a roadshow in Asia. Dates:  Hanoi, Vietnam. 28.07 Hong Kong. 30.07 Macau. 01.08 Seoul, South Korea. 03.08 Tokyo, Japan. 05.08  Part of the IDACB roadshow. Come say hi. We will provide details on the free attendee ticket options and hotel venues in the Telegram group: @aimedistoken.  Roxana, the CCO will be there in all 5 locations. Co-founders will join in Seoul and Tokyo.  Keep you all posted! Thanks for supporting us in our AIM (pun intended).  ~ Roxana from Aimedis

Author: peterkate630
Title: ❤️[PreSale][ANN]Aimedis - HEALTHCARE CHANGED FOREVER❗️10k PATIENTS IN HOSPITALS❗
Body: About Aimedis Aimedis is an AI backed, blockchain and smart contract supported medical ecosystem, that changes the way patients, doctors, and hospitals communicate, connect and handle information.  Using the Aimedis platform, users can store, secure and share their medical information only with the people they want to share it with by using the Aimedis right management system.  Beside the records, AImedis offers videochat and communication with other patients and doctors, online prescriptions, online appointments, learning content, the inclusion of fitness trackers and devices like ECG or bloodpressure monitors into the system, while all transactions inside the system are backed by our porprietary private AIMChain blockchain, while the token is bound to a public blockchain (Aimedis dual-blockchain model). AIMSocial will be the new incentivised and decentralized medical social network where patients can help other patients and get rewarded for it, while the system is supported by AI.

Author: criptix
Title: ❤️[PreSale][ANN]Aimedis - HEALTHCARE CHANGED FOREVER❗️10k PATIENTS IN HOSPITALS❗
Body: Aimedis https://aimedis.com/ ICO https://aim.aimedis.com/ Airdrop https://aim.aimedis.com/airdrop Twitter https://twitter.com/aimedisglobal Whitepaper https://aim.aimedis.com/pdf/WhitepaperEN10.pdf        JOIN OUR TELEGRAM COMMUNITY WITH OVER 26.600 PEOPLE  Aimedis bounty is open! Everyone can join the huge bounty!   Overview of Aimedis  What is Aimedis?  Aimedis is the next generation e-health platform which will connect the efficiency of AI and the security of Blockchain to provide cutting edge medical and psychological support. Aimedis is a platform which will enable patients and doctors to connect with each other 24/7 from everywhere on the planet while offering never before seen security for patient's personal medical and psychological data.   Roxana at the World Blockchain Forum      The dual blockchain design  The Aimedis security system is based on a dual blockchain architecture, allowing Aimedis users to keep ownership of their medical data while allowing them to monetize their private data for  medical research purposes or pay for medical services and medication while getting great discounts by using the AIM token. Medical researchers will be granted only as much or as little confidential data as desired by the patient in a completely anonymized way, protecting the patient's sensitive information while allowing them to both profit and contribute to medical research. The AIMchain private blockchain will make trust visible for the patient and the users and will finally empower the patient via decentralisation and incentivising.   Connected Patient Communities  Aimedis helps connect patients in to communities using a unique social network system. Aimedis will provide a dedicated space for patients to share their experiences, recommendations, feedback, and advice with other patients. By coming together as a community, patient's benefit from sharing their experiences and in offering support to each other.  This helps in dealing with acceptance and treatment of medical conditions.  The members of this community will have rich media capabilities such as uploading video,  audio, text, or image content, allowing them to connect with their peers. This media and content  is part of a creation-incentivized rewards system where creators of high quality content can be rewarded by the other community members with votes.  As a community, members will be able to offer financial incentives (via voting) for content published on the platform. Patient's can use their tokens to pay for services, transact within the community, or exchange to fiat.  Secondarily, this content will be used as data inputs for our Artificial Intelligence when creating  extensive reports on specific medical conditions and diagnosis. This data is appended alongside wearables data, scientific data, and more.   Already a proven existing company  Aimedis is an existing company, which operates today in three countries: Germany, Netherlands and Thailand. Aimedis works today with several hospital chains as a technology provider working with medical data, and has helped more than ten thousand patients.     Helping people all over the world  E-healthcare has the potential to help billions of people from impoverished areas and victims of natural disasters. E-healthcare helps to raise the quality of life and financial cost in first world countries. Aimedis is positioned for this emerging market and thanks to its dual blockchain design brings true security and privacy to patient's data. Based on anonymized data gathering, new discoveries and cures can be found at an accelerated pace, while patient's are financially rewarded for allowing their data to be used in medical research studies.
